ovdesc.p: Utility to perform bulk copying of parent and child orders and trades

desc.p: This field will either hold SEC.OPEN.ORDER or SEC.TRADE ID and only parent transaction can be specified in this field.
All the child and parent record will be reversed and new record will be created in hold status.
Parent transaction id can be provided only if there are no child records in exception.
A maximum of 16 characters may be entered
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
